title: Riot can you permaban this person please?
body: do i really have to dodge and lose lp over people like this? looked up his winrate and its 34 wins 54 losses, hes obviously toxic.

replies.body:
>34 wins 54 losses, hes obviously toxic.

That logic. Not all toxic players are bad, and not all bad players are toxic. Do not confuse correlation with relation.

Player reports are not to be posted on the boards. Use the client's report system, or if you missed that, [submit a support ticket](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new).
